    public constructor(options: Object) source

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    options Object
    options.filename string

    Database filename to use with Sqlite
    options.db Object
    • optional

    Existing SQLite3 object to use for our database If left empty, a database object will be created automatically
